Provide base country layer for PRU maps.

Source: R/base_map.R
base_map.Rd

Provide base country layer for PRU maps.

Usage

base_map(
  colour_sea = "#D8F4FF",
  colour_land = "grey89",
  colour_border = "#A9A9A9",
  colour_graticule = "#D3D3D3",
  colour_backgroud = "#f5f5f2",
  border_size = 0.2
)

Arguments

colour_sea

colour of the sea

colour_land

colour of the land

colour_border

colour of the country border

colour_graticule

colour of the graticule

colour_backgroud

background colour

border_size

thickness of the border line

Value

a ggplot2 object with world countries in LAEA projection.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(pruatlas)
# Plot a world map in LAEA projection.
bm <- base_map()
} # }
